review.description:
If your familiar with the Boerum Hill the name may not look familiar, but the location should.  The most recent name was "Since 1963" but thanks to some 1 star Yelp reviews, the new owners revamped the place.  

Found this place late night looking for a quick Cappucino fix.  The sidewalk tables felt real cozy.  Their cappuccino machine was't running yet :-( however the molten lava cake wasched away my woes.  Their coffee mugs are definitely the most unique I can ever remember seeing.  Hope to go back when they're up and running to give em a better rating!!
review.author: Samuel C.
